characters.name: Police Officer
characters.description: There appears to be a lot of commotion in the hotel lobby. A police officer is available for questions regarding recent events
characters.dialogue: Hey there, you must be /p. After some investigation, your friend Glenn got into an mysterious and unfortunate accident. However, there is still more digging to be done. His room key is at the reception desk, if you want to take a look for yourself. Stay safe /p!

characters.name: Man in Parking Lot
characters.description: There is a man in a suit holding a sealed letter. What could it be?
characters.dialogue: Hey there /p! Hope you have been enjoying your stay at the resort so far. I was invited to attend a special event, but I unfortunately cannot make it. If you beat me in Tic Tac Toe, the invitation is all yours. What do you say?
